com.klarna.rest

Class HttpUrlConnectionTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.klarna.rest.HttpUrlConnectionTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transport

    public class HttpUrlConnectionTransport
extends Object
implements Transport
    HttpURLConnection implementation of Transpoert interface. Used to send HTTP requests to API server.

      • get

        public ApiResponse get(String path,
                       Map<String,String> headers)
                throws ApiException,
                       ProtocolException,
                       ContentTypeException,
                       IOException
        Sends HTTP GET request to specified path.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Transport
        Parameters:
        path - URL path
        headers - HTTP request headers
        Returns:
        Processed response
        Throws:
        ApiException - if API server returned non-20x HTTP CODE and response contains a Error
        ProtocolException - if HTTP status code was non-20x or did not match expected code.
        IOException - if an error occurred connecting to the server.
        ContentTypeException
